channel.title: My new site
channel.description:
Ive been working on this site for about a week now, its a help site for a game I play. The site has been approved. http://www.freewebs.com/gatesofsurvivalhelp/
Anyways it will start looking better soon

item.title: My new site
item.dc:creator: @raindropsc raindropsc
item.description:
@raindropsc wrote:

Hmm, you could do some things with the text, also, add a Encoding as well as a title [code]

{insert site title here}

{site content goes here}

[/code] you should modify the code up there so it meets your needs(assuming you dont use a external css page)

Read full topic

item.title: My new site
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

[quote=“nohope, post:6, topic:132702”][quote author=OnlyOneRule link=topic=183944.msg1669318#msg1669318 date=1186938590]
LOL THAT TOOK YOU A WEEK???
[/quote]The funny thing is http://onlyonerule.pwnds.info/
And your making fun of his website.[/quote]

Ooooh, BUUUURN…

Yeah, Archer. It could be much better. If you need any help, feel free to ask questions. Or if everyone starts calling you a noob or whatever, you can check out my sig (heh, sorry. Shameless website plug.).

Read full topic

item.title: My new site
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:8, topic:132702”][quote author=OnlyOneRule link=topic=183944.msg1669322#msg1669322 date=1186938997]

[quote author=nohope link=topic=183944.msg1669320#msg1669320 date=1186938932]

LOL THAT TOOK YOU A WEEK???
[/quote]The funny thing is http://onlyonerule.pwnds.info/
And your making fun of his website.

… im working on more that 1 project and all hes done is made a few links to different pages, with nothing on them which took a week
[/quote]You found a template and put some words on there, you both put the same effort, yours just looks a bit better, but it still doesn’t look very good.[/quote]

i found a template?? more like i made a template

item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Could be much better. (X)HTML and CSS are things you will never regret learning, so add me on AIM or MSN, and I’ll be glad to walk you through it all.
